feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In an IRC conversation, sipa suggested "key id" as a replacement for "address". Luke-Jr clarified that he wasn't proposing to rename scriptPubKey, just the destination-for-transaction presented to end-users. However, Mark Friedenbach expressed concern over the term "invoice" causing possible confusion over the payment protocol.
